title: How To unlock a post
snippet: If you want to unlock/decrypt a post which is probably an active HTB machine you should provide the password which is basicallyFor Linux machine:Grab it from remote machine using : cat /etc/shadow | grep root | cut -d : -f 2For Windows machine:It’s just the NTLM hash

title: RSA explained
